title: Myths and Legends
description: In this digital short story series, Sam Lang (Reprisal, A Vampireâ€™s Guide to Sex, Theoretical Fishsticks) brings you the end of the world. It is a zombie apocalypse brought on by an unlikely source. Each edition of this series will be the portrait of a different character and their desperate struggle for survival.Myths and Legends tells the story of some survivors in New York. It tells the myth of a small band of wanna-be superheroes as they challenge the legend of Randall Bueller, the former CEO of Health-Pharm, the company credited with causing the end of the world.
author: Sam Lang
